description: Rub this on your skin when you are expecting exposure to extreme cold temperatures.  Cannot protect from instant frostbite.  Smells like the inside of a sheep.

This product was advertised before the Cataclysm for extreme cold environment protection.  You remember a demonstration involving a woman coating her hand in this and plunging it in liquid nitrogen for a second.  You're pretty sure that was staged.

A yellow stick of milkfat and milk solids, made from cow's milk and the power of the atom.  All radiation levels are confirmed to be in line with background exposure and any cancers later in life have nothing to do with this butter or any products made with this butter.
